Invocation Name: academic story
des:
Listen to this story about alternative learning, the corporate world uses flip school effectively, can we bridge this to academia and schools? In this story Scrooge McDuck , the late billionaire, does create such a university, which is edtech, something all ducks are proud of..... 
Can the dry land humans copy this? Listen on to find out...
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
